params.text:
🧹 Cleaning up corrupted installation files...
🗑️ Removing invalid pip install artifacts

params.message: echo 'Removing corrupted files:' && ls -la | grep '^-.*=.*' && rm -f =* || echo 'No corrupted files found'
echo 'Cleaning Python cache:' && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

params.text: ✅ Cleanup completed! Now try reinstalling or starting the application.
